name: Pills (TonicGames)
description:
In Pills you work as a pharmacist, and you are responsible for prescription the right medicines to customers suffering from various ailments. Help as many customers as possible within your shift and try and get as many points as possible. 

This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 (Theme: "Take Care"). We hope you have fun playing it!
